links.title: Season 2 Episode 1 - Mark Dow of Behavioral Macro by JC Parets
links.description: This conversation with Mark Dow kicks off Season 2 of the All Star Charts Interviews. Mark worked for the U.S. Treasury Department in charge of Emerging Markets in the early 90s and later was a sovereign analyst at a Mutual Fund before ultimately running money for a Global Macro Hedge Fund in New York City.
